item.title: Erica add a quote by Truman Capote
item.description: "More tears are shed over answered prayers than unanswered ones." -- Truman Capote

item.title: Erica add a quote by Laura Kightlinger
item.description: "I can’t think of anything worse after a night of drinking than waking up next to someone and not being able to remember their name, or how you met, or why they’re dead." -- Laura Kightlinger

item.title: Erica add a quote by Jennifer Weiner
item.description: "I think every person who is single should have a dog. I think the government should step in and intervene: If you're not married or coupled up, whether you've been dumped or divorced or widowed or whatever, they should require you to proceed immediately to the pound nearest you and select an animal companion." -- Jennifer Weiner

item.title: Erica add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
